trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SciQuest Spend Director
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SciQuest Spend Director

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and SciQuest Spend Director.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and SciQuest Spend Director.

trans-unit.source:
The objective of this tutorial is to show you how to integrate SciQuest Spend Director with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).
Integrating SciQuest Spend Director with Azure AD provides you with the following benefits:
trans-unit.target:
The objective of this tutorial is to show you how to integrate SciQuest Spend Director with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).
Integrating SciQuest Spend Director with Azure AD provides you with the following benefits:

trans-unit.source: You can control in Azure AD who has access to SciQuest Spend Director
trans-unit.target: You can control in Azure AD who has access to SciQuest Spend Director

trans-unit.source: You can enable your users to automatically get signed-on to SciQuest Spend Director (Single Sign-On) with their Azure AD accounts
trans-unit.target: You can enable your users to automatically get signed-on to SciQuest Spend Director (Single Sign-On) with their Azure AD accounts

trans-unit.source: You can manage your accounts in one central location - the Azure Active Directory Portal
trans-unit.target: You can manage your accounts in one central location - the Azure Active Directory Portal

trans-unit.source: If you want to know more details about SaaS app integration with Azure AD, see <linkText>What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to know more details about SaaS app integration with Azure AD, see <linkText>What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: To configure Azure AD integration with SciQuest Spend Director, you need the following items:
trans-unit.target: To configure Azure AD integration with SciQuest Spend Director, you need the following items:

trans-unit.source: An Azure AD subscription
trans-unit.target: An Azure AD subscription

trans-unit.source: A SciQuest Spend Director single-sign on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A SciQuest Spend Director single-sign on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: To test the steps in this tutorial, we do not recommend using a production environment.
trans-unit.target: To test the steps in this tutorial, we do not recommend using a production environment.

trans-unit.source: To test the steps in this tutorial, you should follow these recommendations:
trans-unit.target: To test the steps in this tutorial, you should follow these recommendations:

trans-unit.source: You should not use your production environment, unless this is necessary.
trans-unit.target: You should not use your production environment, unless this is necessary.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure AD trial environment, you can get a one-month trial <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure AD trial environment, you can get a one-month trial <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source:
The objective of this tutorial is to enable you to test Azure AD single sign-on in a test environment.
The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of two main building blocks:
trans-unit.target:
The objective of this tutorial is to enable you to test Azure AD single sign-on in a test environment.
The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of two main building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Adding SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery
trans-unit.target: Adding SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery

trans-unit.source: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on

trans-unit.source: To configure the integration of SciQuest Spend Director into Azure AD, you need to add SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery to your list of managed SaaS apps.
trans-unit.target: To configure the integration of SciQuest Spend Director into Azure AD, you need to add SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery to your list of managed SaaS apps.

trans-unit.source: To add SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To add SciQuest Spend Director from the gallery, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source:
In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

Active Directory
trans-unit.target:
In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source:
To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

Applications
trans-unit.target:
To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

Applications

trans-unit.source:
Click Add at the bottom of the page.

Applications
trans-unit.target:
Click Add at the bottom of the page.

Applications

trans-unit.source:
On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

Applications
trans-unit.target:
On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

Applications

trans-unit.source:
In the search box, type sciQuest spend director.
Applications
trans-unit.target:
In the search box, type sciQuest spend director.
Applications

trans-unit.source:
In the results pane, select SciQuest Spend Director, and then click Complete to add the application.
Applications
trans-unit.target:
In the results pane, select SciQuest Spend Director, and then click Complete to add the application.
Applications

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to show you how to configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director based on a test user called "Britta Simon".
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to show you how to configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director based on a test user called "Britta Simon".

trans-unit.source:
For single sign-on to work, Azure AD needs to know what the counterpart user in SciQuest Spend Director to an user in Azure AD is. In other words, a link relationship between an Azure AD user and the related user in SciQuest Spend Director needs to be established.
This link relationship is established by assigning the value of the user name in Azure AD as the value of the Username in SciQuest Spend Director.
trans-unit.target:
For single sign-on to work, Azure AD needs to know what the counterpart user in SciQuest Spend Director to an user in Azure AD is. In other words, a link relationship between an Azure AD user and the related user in SciQuest Spend Director needs to be established.
This link relationship is established by assigning the value of the user name in Azure AD as the value of the Username in SciQuest Spend Director.

trans-unit.source: To configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director, you need to complete the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: To configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director, you need to complete the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: [Configuring Azure AD Single Single Sign-On](#configuring-azure-ad-single-single-sign-on) - to enable your users to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: [Configuring Azure AD Single Single Sign-On](#configuring-azure-ad-single-single-sign-on) - to enable your users to use this feature.

trans-unit.source: [Creating an Azure AD test user](#creating-an-azure-ad-test-user) - to test Azure AD single sign-on with Britta Simon.
trans-unit.target: [Creating an Azure AD test user](#creating-an-azure-ad-test-user) - to test Azure AD single sign-on with Britta Simon.

trans-unit.source: [Creating a SciQuest Spend Director test user](#creating-a-halogen-software-test-user) - to have a counterpart of Britta Simon in SciQuest Spend Director that is linked to the Azure AD representation of her.
trans-unit.target: [Creating a SciQuest Spend Director test user](#creating-a-halogen-software-test-user) - to have a counterpart of Britta Simon in SciQuest Spend Director that is linked to the Azure AD representation of her.

trans-unit.source: [Assigning the Azure AD test user](#assigning-the-azure-ad-test-user) - to enable Britta Simon to use Azure AD single sign-on.
trans-unit.target: [Assigning the Azure AD test user](#assigning-the-azure-ad-test-user) - to enable Britta Simon to use Azure AD single sign-on.

trans-unit.source: [Testing Single Sign-On](#testing-single-sign-on) - to verify whether the configuration works.
trans-unit.target: [Testing Single Sign-On](#testing-single-sign-on) - to verify whether the configuration works.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to enable Azure AD single sign-on in the Azure AD portal and to configure single sign-on in your SciQuest Spend Director application.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to enable Azure AD single sign-on in the Azure AD portal and to configure single sign-on in your SciQuest Spend Director application.

trans-unit.source: To configure Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure Azure AD single sign-on with SciQuest Spend Director, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source:
In the Azure AD portal, on the SciQuest Spend Director application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the Configure Single Sign-On dialog.

Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target:
In the Azure AD portal, on the SciQuest Spend Director application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the Configure Single Sign-On dialog.

Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source:
On the How would you like users to sign on to SciQuest Spend Director page, select Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

Azure AD Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target:
On the How would you like users to sign on to SciQuest Spend Director page, select Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

Azure AD Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source:
On the Configure App Settings dialog page, perform the following steps:

Configure App Settings
trans-unit.target:
On the Configure App Settings dialog page, perform the following steps:

Configure App Settings

trans-unit.source: In the Sign On URL textbox, type your URL used by your users to sign on to your SciQuest Spend Director application using the following pattern: https://.sciquest.com/.**
trans-unit.target: In the Sign On URL textbox, type your URL used by your users to sign on to your SciQuest Spend Director application using the following pattern: https://.sciquest.com/.**

trans-unit.source: In the Reply URL textbox, type the same value you have typed into the Sign On URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Reply URL textbox, type the same value you have typed into the Sign On URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source:
On the Configure single sign-on at SciQuest Spend Director page, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file locally on your computer.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Configure single sign-on at SciQuest Spend Director page, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file locally on your computer.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: Contact SciQuest support to enable this authentication method using the above downloaded metadata.
trans-unit.target: Contact SciQuest support to enable this authentication method using the above downloaded metadata.

trans-unit.source:
On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
On the Single sign-on confirmation page, click Complete.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Single sign-on confirmation page, click Complete.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to create a test user in the Azure portal called Britta Simon.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to create a test user in the Azure portal called Britta Simon.

trans-unit.source: To create a test user in Azure AD, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To create a test user in Azure AD, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source:
In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source:
To display the list of users, in the menu on the top, click Users.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
To display the list of users, in the menu on the top, click Users.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
To open the Add User dialog, in the toolbar on the bottom, click Add User.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
To open the Add User dialog, in the toolbar on the bottom, click Add User.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
On the Tell us about this user dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Tell us about this user dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: As Type Of User, select New user in your organization.
trans-unit.target: As Type Of User, select New user in your organization.

trans-unit.source: In the User Name textbox, type BrittaSimon.
trans-unit.target: In the User Name textbox, type BrittaSimon.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source:
On the User Profile dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the User Profile dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: In the First Name textbox, type Britta.
trans-unit.target: In the First Name textbox, type Britta.

trans-unit.source: In the Last Name txtbox, type, Simon.
trans-unit.target: In the Last Name txtbox, type, Simon.

trans-unit.source: In the Display Name textbox, type Britta Simon.
trans-unit.target: In the Display Name textbox, type Britta Simon.

trans-unit.source: In the Role list, select User.
trans-unit.target: In the Role list, select User.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source:
On the Get temporary password dialog page, click create.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Get temporary password dialog page, click create.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
On the Get temporary password dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Get temporary password dialog page, perform the following steps:

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: Write down the value of the New Password.
trans-unit.target: Write down the value of the New Password.

trans-unit.source: Click Complete.
trans-unit.target: Click Complete.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to create a user called Britta Simon in SciQuest Spend Director.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to create a user called Britta Simon in SciQuest Spend Director.

trans-unit.source: You need to contact your SciQuest Spend Director support team and provide them with the details about your test account to get it created.
trans-unit.target: You need to contact your SciQuest Spend Director support team and provide them with the details about your test account to get it created.

trans-unit.source:
Alternatively, you can also leverage just-in-time provisioning, a single sign-on feature that is supported by SciQuest Spend Director.
If just-in-time provisioning is enabled, users are automatically created by SciQuest Spend Director during a single sign-on attempt if they don't exist. This feature eliminates the need to manually create single sign-on counterpart users.
trans-unit.target:
Alternatively, you can also leverage just-in-time provisioning, a single sign-on feature that is supported by SciQuest Spend Director.
If just-in-time provisioning is enabled, users are automatically created by SciQuest Spend Director during a single sign-on attempt if they don't exist. This feature eliminates the need to manually create single sign-on counterpart users.

trans-unit.source: To get just-in-time provisioning enabled, you need to contact your your SciQuest Spend Director support team.
trans-unit.target: To get just-in-time provisioning enabled, you need to contact your your SciQuest Spend Director support team.

trans-unit.source:
The objective of this section is to enabling Britta Simon to use Azure single sign-on by granting her access to SciQuest Spend Director.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
The objective of this section is to enabling Britta Simon to use Azure single sign-on by granting her access to SciQuest Spend Director.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: To assign Britta Simon to SciQuest Spend Director, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign Britta Simon to SciQuest Spend Director, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source:
On the Azure portal, to open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.


What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
On the Azure portal, to open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.


What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
In the applications list, select SciQuest Spend Director.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
In the applications list, select SciQuest Spend Director.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
In the menu on the top, click Users.


What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
In the menu on the top, click Users.


What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
In the Users list, select Britta Simon.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
In the Users list, select Britta Simon.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
In the toolbar on the bottom, click Assign.

What is Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target:
In the toolbar on the bottom, click Assign.

What is Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source:
The objective of this section is to test your Azure AD single sign-on configuration using the Access Panel.
When you click the SciQuest Spend Director tile in the Access Panel, you should get automatically signed-on to your SciQuest Spend Director application.
trans-unit.target:
The objective of this section is to test your Azure AD single sign-on configuration using the Access Panel.
When you click the SciQuest Spend Director tile in the Access Panel, you should get automatically signed-on to your SciQuest Spend Director application.
